comments:
Using N20060418 + debug from HEAD + jdt debug from HEAD

Logical structure is on from the Variables View and the view is visible.
* Suspend at the first line from the test case
* Expand the ArrayList variable after something has been added.  
* Hold down the step over key.

Testcase:
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		ArrayList x = new ArrayList();
		for (int i=0; i<5; i++)
		{
			x.add(0, "a" + i);
		}
	}

Fixed in JavaLogicalStructure. Errors are shown to the user in the variables view when a logical structure eval fails, so there's no need to log the error.

The disconnected exceptions do not appear to be related.
NOTE: The error is acceptable when stepping quickly, as the thread is resumed while trying to eval a structure.
